Symbol.Script_VL:
! ============================================================================== ! Rail Post with Panels ! ==============================================================================
hideparameter all "A", "B", "ZZYZX"
call "FM_types" parameters all
! ============================================================================== ! General Dimensions ! ==============================================================================
call "railParameterControl_m" parameters all
! ============================================================================== ! Structural Dimensions ! ==============================================================================
dim stHandrailType[2] stHandrailType[1] = `Прямоугольные` stHandrailType[2] = `Закругленный`
values "hrt" stHandrailType values "hrt_m" 1, 2
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "hrt" then hrt_m = 1 if hrt = stHandrailType[2] then hrt_m = 2 parameters hrt_m = hrt_m else hrt = stHandrailType[1] if hrt_m = 2 then hrt = stHandrailType[2] parameters hrt = hrt endif
dim stPostType[2] stPostType[1] = `Прямоугольные` stPostType[2] = `Закругленный`
values "pt" stPostType values "pt_m" 1, 2
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "pt" then pt_m = 1 if pt = stPostType[2] then pt_m = 2 parameters pt_m = pt_m else pt = stPostType[1] if pt_m = 2 then pt = stPostType[2] parameters pt = pt endif
if ptyp_m <> 1 then if hrt_m = 1 then values "b" hrw if hrt_m = 2 then values "b" hrd lock "a","b","zzyzx" hideparameter "LengthSize" else if hrt_m = 1 then if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "hrw" then B = hrw parameters B = B else hrw = B parameters hrw = hrw endif else if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "hrd" then B = hrd parameters B = B else hrd = B parameters hrd = hrd endif endif
lock "a","zzyzx" endif
! ============================================================================== ! Symbolic 2D ! ==============================================================================
dim stPostSymbolType[5] stPostSymbolType[1] = `Тип 1` stPostSymbolType[2] = `Тип 2` stPostSymbolType[3] = `Тип 3` stPostSymbolType[4] = `Тип 4` stPostSymbolType[5] = `Нет`
values "postSymbolType" stPostSymbolType values "iPostSymbolType" 1, 2, 3, 4 if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "postSymbolType" then iPostSymbolType = 1 if postSymbolType = stPostSymbolType[2] then iPostSymbolType = 2 if postSymbolType = stPostSymbolType[3] then iPostSymbolType = 3 if postSymbolType = stPostSymbolType[4] then iPostSymbolType = 4 parameters iPostSymbolType = iPostSymbolType else postSymbolType = stPostSymbolType[1] if iPostSymbolType = 2 then postSymbolType = stPostSymbolType[2] if iPostSymbolType = 3 then postSymbolType = stPostSymbolType[3] if iPostSymbolType = 4 then postSymbolType = stPostSymbolType[4] parameters postSymbolType = postSymbolType endif
if NOT(bPostSymbol) then lock "postSymbolType", "iPostSymbolType", "postLineType", "postPen" hideparameter "postSymbolType", "iPostSymbolType", "postLineType", "postPen" endif
if NOT(sa) then lock "al", "gs_RailAxisPen" hideparameter "al", "gs_RailAxisPen" endif
! ====================================================================== ! UI ! ======================================================================
call "ui_rails" parameters iObjectType = 5, gs_ui_current_page = gs_ui_current_page
Symbol.Script_1D:
! ============================================================================== ! Rail Post with Panels ! ==============================================================================
EPS = 0.0001
modInclAngle = ani if iInclinationMethod = 1 then modInclAngle = 0 call "m_Rail Post with Panels" parameters all ani = modInclAngle
Symbol.Keywords: Прямолинейная форма, изогнутая форма, скат, круглый профиль, прямоугольный профиль
Symbol.Script_FWM:
actualGUID = FROM_GUID
! ============================================================================== ! Subroutines ! ==============================================================================
_autoID = "9B5F2299-795B-4768-95E9-E1CB8FD689C9" _startID = "E44B5E38-8886-43A5-9EF3-15BB8125708F" _endID = "DF1A5E8F-D2B2-46A5-9F8D-16108434C64E" gosub "paramNameChange_FWM"
! ============================================================================== ! Set migration GUID ! ==============================================================================
setmigrationguid actualGUID
! ============================================================================== end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! en ! ==============================================================================
! ============================================================================== ! paramNameChange ! ============================================================================== "paramNameChange_FWM": if actualGuid = _startID | actualGuid = _autoID then _bHasParam = DELETED_PAR_VALUE("bSymbolic2D", _tempSymbolic2D) if _bHasParam then bPostSymbol = _tempSymbolic2D parameters bPostSymbol = bPostSymbol endif
_bHasParam2 = STORED_PAR_VALUE("iPostSymbolType", _iTempPostSymbolType) if _bHasParam2 then if _iTempPostSymbolType = 0 then bPostSymbol = 0 else bPostSymbol = 1 endif
parameters bPostSymbol = bPostSymbol , iPostSymbolType= iPostSymbolType
endif
actualGuid = _endID endif return
Symbol.Script_BWM:
targetGUID = TO_GUID
! ============================================================================== ! Subroutines ! ==============================================================================
gosub "paramNameChange_BWM"
! ============================================================================== ! Set migration GUID ! ==============================================================================
setmigrationguid targetGuid
! ============================================================================== end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! en ! ==============================================================================
! ============================================================================== ! paramNameChange ! ============================================================================== "paramNameChange_BWM": if targetGUID # "" then
newparameter "bSymbolic2D", "Boolean"
bSymbolic2D = bPostSymbol parameters bSymbolic2D = bSymbolic2D
dim txt_symb[5] txt_symb[1] = `Тип 1` txt_symb[2] = `Тип 2` txt_symb[3] = `Тип 3` txt_symb[4] = `Тип 4` txt_symb[5] = `Нет`
if not(bPostSymbol) then iPostSymbolType = 0 postSymbolType = txt_symb[5] else iPostSymbolType = iPostSymbolType postSymbolType = txt_symb[iPostSymbolType] endif parameters iPostSymbolType = iPostSymbolType , postSymbolType = postSymbolType endif return
